product_name: Big Agnes Memory Foam Mummy Pad Kit - Regular - 2008 Closeout
long_description: What a difference another 2.5 in. of padding makes when sleeping on the ground! Use this memory-foam pad cover with your existing pad for unsurpassed comfort on all your camping adventures.
